titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for repealing and making voyd of all letters of marque or reprisall, and commissions of that nature, granted before the first of Iuly, in the 18th yeare of His Majesties raigne.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the University,

notesStmt.note: With engraving of royal seal at head of document.
Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Oxford, the 19. day of December, in the twentieth yeare of Our Reigne.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
